thread.title: Police: 17-Year-Old Boy Dies After Being Shot In Back
thread.title_full: Police: 17-Year-Old Boy Dies After Being Shot In Back

author: CBS Philly
title: Police: 17-Year-Old Boy Dies After Being Shot In Back
text:
Police: 17-Year-Old Boy Dies After Being Shot In Back February 15, 2017 1:25 PM Filed Under: Philadelphia Police Department , Point Breeze Teen fatally shot on Bancroft Street in Philadelphia. (credit: CBS 3) 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) â€” A teenage boy was shot and killed in the Point Breeze section of Philadelphia on Wednesday afternoon. 
The shooting happened in the 1500 block of South Bancroft Street. 
Police say a 17-year-old was shot twice in the back. 
He was transported to Presbyterian Hospital where he died. 
No arrests have been made.
